verses.name: Deuteronomy 26:8
verses.text: And the Lord brought us forth out of Egypt with a mighty hand, and with an outstretched arm, and with great terribleness, and with signs, and with wonders:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 26:9
verses.text: And he hath brought us into this place, and hath given us this land, even a land that floweth with milk and honey.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 26:10
verses.text: And now, behold, I have brought the firstfruits of the land, which thou, O Lord, hast given me. And thou shalt set it before the Lord thy God, and worship before the Lord thy God:
